title: Replace founder profile image with uploaded BarnaliC.png

requirements.summary: Replace the founder profile image (Barnali Chakraborty) in the Core Team section with the uploaded BarnaliC.png image, maintaining 400x400 dimensions
acceptanceCriteria: The CoreTeam component displays the BarnaliC.dim_400x400.png image for Barnali Chakraborty's profile
The image dimensions are exactly 400x400 pixels
Aggressive cache-busting timestamp query parameter is applied to force immediate browser reload
The uploaded BarnaliC.png photo is used without AI generation or modification

file_operations.description: Update the founder profile image path from BarnaliChakrborty.dim_400x400.png to BarnaliC.dim_400x400.png for Barnali Chakraborty's team member card. Maintain the existing cache-busting timestamp query parameter pattern to ensure immediate browser reload of the new image. The image reference should use the workspace path frontend/public/assets/generated/BarnaliC.dim_400x400.png.

requirements.summary: Render the uploaded BarnaliC.png founder profile image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory with 400x400 dimensions
acceptanceCriteria: The BarnaliC.png image is processed and saved as BarnaliC.dim_400x400.png in frontend/public/assets/generated
The image is resized to exactly 400x400 pixels while maintaining aspect ratio
The exact uploaded photo is used without AI generation

file_operations.description: Process the uploaded BarnaliC.png image and save it as a 400x400 pixel static asset at frontend/public/assets/generated/BarnaliC.dim_400x400.png. Resize the image to exactly 400x400 dimensions while maintaining aspect ratio. This is the exact uploaded photo that will replace the existing founder profile image in the CoreTeam component.
